reviews.review_msg: the final exam was nasty.  His notes are hard to read and he is very unorganize

this course is just as easy a physics 1oo, this is totally grade 12 review. However you gota watch out the prof, he will mark the exams are harsh as possible. He will pick on any detail that did not met his expectations. His exams are out of few marks, so losing a whole mark on some unecessary detail should be avoided
